native.name: SAP HANA persistence Services
native.description: It enables organization to analyze business operations based on large volume and variety of detailed data in real-time with capabilities like predictive analytics, geospatial, text search etc

native.name: SAP ASE persistence Services
native.description: It is a cost-effective database solution that can handle large numbers of transactions and concurrent users with superior performance, reliability, efficiency and is used by customers worldwide.

native.name: Document Services
native.description: The SAP HANA Cloud Platform Document Service provides an open standard based(CMIS) enterprise cloud content repository for unstructured or semi-structured content.

native.name: SAP API Management
native.description: It’s a simple, scalable and secure access to digital assets and enables engagement of employees and developers.

native.name: SAP HANA Cloud Connector
native.description: This enables easy integration of the on-premise data with the SAP HANA Cloud Platform without compromising security of the onPrem landscape

native.name: SAP Fiori, Cloud Edition
native.description: Renew your SAP Business Suite UX by deploying the new SAP Fiori UI on the cloud, securely connected to your on-premise systems.

native.name: SAP HANA Cloud Portal
native.description: Provides an easy way for creating enterprise-grade business sites with the full power of authorization management, content development and integration to SAP's cloud, on-premise and third-party solutions.

native.name: SAP Forms as a Service by Adobe
native.description: Forms service running on SAP HANA Cloud Platform to generate print & interactive forms-including PDF/A for archiving on-premise. Has integration with SAP backend data & SAP printing servers.

native.name: SAP HANA spatial/GIS
native.description: It provides functions to analyze and process geospatial information in SAP HANA with high performance.

native.name: SAP HANA Predictive Analysis Library
native.description: A built-in and native SAP HANA library to perform predictions based on in-database data mining and statistical calculations.

native.name: SAP HANA Text search and analysis
native.description: Enables processing of texts in unstructured content (e.g. for sentiment analysis).

native.name: SAP HANA Series Data
native.description: It allows the measuring of data over time where time is commonly equidistant; it allows to detect and forecast trends in data.

native.name: SAP Jam
native.description: Enables developers to build collaborative application experiences for enterprise and external teams.

native.name: Gamification Service
native.description: Brings gamification into the enterprise to engage and motivate employees with rewarding experiences.

native.name: SAP Mobile documents
native.description: Provides unified access of on-premise business content (SAP Business Suite or 3rd party such as MS SharePoint). Enables sharing of content inside and outside the enterprise in a secure way.

native.name: SAP Cloud Identity
native.description: Offers central user authentication, web single sign-on (SS0) and user management as Software-as-a-Service enabling a seamless experience for end users across solutions. It’s based on open industry-standard SAML and OAuth protocols.

native.name: Mobile Services
native.description: It enable developers build & manage mobile apps for iOS, Android and Windows with a scalable cloud backend.

native.name: IoT Services
native.description: These services can be used to manage & connect devices to the HANA Cloud Platform in order to use data from these devices in applications.

native.name: Remote Data Sync Services
native.description: It provides a service for synchronizing data from a huge numbers sensors in a remote database into a consolidated SAP HANA database in the cloud. Ensuring consistency of data inspite of connection loss etc.

native.name: SAP Hybris as a Service
native.description: It allows developers to create, offer and sell business service packages based on a micro-service centric programming model and customers to leverage these services for extending existing and new front-office solutions faster than ever.
